title: Brightness Issue

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
So I am just playing league like normal and get into a game when I realize that my game is very dark. There is a link to a screenshot of me in game. Any help would be amazing thanks.                

EDIT: I solved it by changing my resolution and changing it back :/

replies.body: Sounds like you had accidentally altered the brightness or resolution color settings, glad you were able to straighten that out though!
